hero.name: THE MANDALORIAN
hero.specialAbility:
When The Mandalorian defends, add +1 defense for each BESKAR ARMOR card in your discard pile. 
If you draw any BESKAR ARMOR cards to start the game, reshuffle and draw again.

cards.title: I CAN BRING YOU IN WARM...
cards.afterText: If you won the combat, you may draw 4 cards from the deck, keep 2, return the other 2 to the deck, and reshuffle the deck.

cards.title: ... oR I CAN BRING YOU IN COLD
cards.afterText: If you defeat an opposing fighter with this card, you may draw 2 cards from the deck.

cards.title: THIS IS THE WAY
cards.duringText: If The Child is still alive, the attack value of this card is 7.

cards.title: BESKAR ARMOR
cards.afterText: If The Child is still alive, draw 1 card.

cards.title: PULSE SHOCK
cards.immediateText: This card can only be used against an adjacent fighter.
cards.afterText: The player controlling the opposing fighter loses 1 action next turn.

cards.title: WHISTLING BIRDS
cards.basicText: The Mandalorian does 2 damage to all heroes he can attack and 3 damage to all sidekicks he can attack.

cards.title: CABLE SHOT
cards.basicText: Choose a character The Mandalorian can attack. Move that character adjacent to Mando. That character takes 2 damage.

cards.title: RISING PHOENIX
cards.basicText: If The Child is still alive, draw 1 card. Then place The Mandalorian in any open space. If The Child was adjacent to Mando before playing this card, you may also place The Child in any open space adjacent to Mando's new space.

cards.title: FORCE POWERS
cards.duringText: Choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 3 spaces.
cards.afterText:
Choose 1 of the following 2 effects: 
- The Mandalorian recovers 3 damage
- The Child recovers 3 damage.

cards.title: FEINT
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

cards.title: REGROUP
cards.afterText: Draw 1 card. If you won the combat, draw 2 cards instead.

cards.title: DASH
cards.afterText: Move your fighter up to 3 spaces.
